analyzed: idha bhikkhu chanda samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti
vīriya samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāva iti
citta samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāva iti
katham ca bhikkhu chanda samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti

original: Chandañce bhikkhu adhipatiṁ karitvā labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassekaggataṁ—
analyzed: chandam ce bhikkhu adhipatim karitvā labhati samādhi labhati cittassa ekagga tā

original: So anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati
analyzed: saḥ an uppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam an uppādāya chandam janeti vā āyamati

original: vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ
analyzed: vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati uppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammāna

original: pahānāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati, anuppannānaṁ
analyzed: pahānāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti
analyzed: kusalānam dhammānam uppādāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti

original: padahati, uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
analyzed: padahati uppannānam kusalānam dhammānam ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya

original: bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
analyzed: bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: Iti ayañca chandasamādhi, ime ca padhānasaṅkhārā.
analyzed: iti ayam ca chanda samādhi ime ca padhāna saṅkhārā

original: Tadekajjhaṁ abhisaññūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārotveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: tat ekajjham abhisaññūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā saṅkhyam gacchati

original: Yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā kusalo dhammacchando—
analyzed: yaḥ chando chandika tā kattu kamya tā kusalaḥ dhammacchando

original: Yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi—
analyzed: yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti a visāhāraḥ a vikkhepaḥ a visāhaṭa mānasa tā samathaḥ samādhi indriyam samādhi balam sammāsamādhi

original: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo ṭhiti
analyzed: yaḥ cetasikaḥ vīriya ārambhaḥ nikkamaḥ parakkamaḥ uyyāmaḥ vāyāmaḥ ussāhaḥ ussoḷhī thāmaḥ ṭhiti
a sithila parakkama tā a nikkhitta chanda tā a nikkhitta dhura tā dhura sampaggāhaḥ vīriya

original: Iti iminā ca chandena, iminā ca samādhinā, iminā ca padhānasaṅkhārena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato.
analyzed: iti iminā ca chandena iminā ca samādhinā iminā ca padhāna saṅkhārena upetaḥ hoti samupetaḥ upāgataḥ samupāgataḥ upapannaḥ sampanno samannāgataḥ
tena vuccati chanda samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgataḥ iti

original: Yā tesaṁ dhammānaṁ iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
analyzed: yā tesam dhammānam iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā lābhaḥ paṭilābhaḥ patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā
tathābhūtassa vedanā kkhandho saññā kkhandho saṅkhāra kkhandho viññāṇa kkhandho
katham ca bhikkhu vīriya samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti

original: Vīriyañce bhikkhu adhipatiṁ karitvā labhati samādhiṁ labhati cittassekaggataṁ—
analyzed: vīriyam ce bhikkhu adhipatim karitvā labhati samādhim labhati cittassa ekagga ta

original: So anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati
analyzed: saḥ an uppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam an uppādāya chandam janeti vā āyamati

analyzed: vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati uppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam pahānāya pe

analyzed: iti ayam ca vīriya samādhi ime ca padhāna saṅkhārā

original: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye vīmaṁsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandha abhiñña tasmin samaye vīmasā samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti

original: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
analyzed: yā paññā pajānanā pe amohaḥ dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna

original: Yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti …pe… sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
analyzed: yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti pe sammāsamādhi samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna

original: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe… sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
analyzed: yaḥ cetasikaḥ vīriya ārambhaḥ pe sammāvāyāmaḥ vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna

original: Iti imāya ca vīmaṁsāya, iminā ca samādhinā, iminā ca padhānasaṅkhārena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato.
analyzed: iti imāya ca vīmasāya iminā ca samādhinā iminā ca padhāna saṅkhārena upetaḥ hoti samupetaḥ upāgataḥ samupāgataḥ upapannaḥ sampanno samannāgataḥ
tena vuccati vīmasā samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgataḥ ti

original: Yā tesaṁ dhammānaṁ iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā.
analyzed: yā tesam dhammānam iddhi samiddhi ijjhanā samijjhanā lābhaḥ paṭilābhaḥ patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā
chanda iddhipādaḥ vīriya iddhipādaḥ cittiddhipādaḥ vīmasiddhipādaḥ

original: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ
analyzed: idha bhikkhu yasmin samaye lokuttaram jhānam bhāveti niyyānikam apacaya gāmim diṭṭhi gatāna

original: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yo tasmiṁ samaye chando chandikatā kattukamyatā
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam yaḥ tasmin samaye chandaḥ chandika tā kattu kamya tā

original: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ
analyzed: idha bhikkhu yasmin samaye lokuttaram jhānam bhāveti niyyānikam apacaya gāmim diṭṭhi gatāna

original: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe…
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandha abhiñña yaḥ tasmin samaye cetasikaḥ vīriya ārambhaḥ pe
sammāvāyāmaḥ vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna

original: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ
analyzed: idha bhikkhu yasmin samaye lokuttaram jhānam bhāveti niyyānikam apacaya gāmim diṭṭhi gatāna

original: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yaṁ tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ …pe…
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandha abhiñña yam tasmin samaye cittam manaḥ mānasam pe

original: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ
analyzed: idha bhikkhu yasmin samaye lokuttaram jhānam bhāveti niyyānikam apacaya gāmim diṭṭhi gatāna

original: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yā tasmiṁ samaye paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandha abhiñña yā tasmin samaye paññā pajānanā pe amoho
dhamma vicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna

original: idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi …pe…
analyzed: idha bhikkhu chanda samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti vīriya samādhi pe

original: Catunnaṁ iddhipādānaṁ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā …pe… kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?
analyzed: catunnam iddhipādānam kati kusalā kati akusalā kati abyākatā pe kati saraṇā kati araṇā

original: Siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
analyzed: siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā

original: Siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā.
analyzed: siyā sa vitakka sa vicārā siyā a vitakka vicāra mattā siyā a vitakka a vicārā

original: Siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā.
analyzed: siyā pīti sahagatā siyā sukha sahagatā siyā upekkhā sahagatā
na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā
na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukā
na magga ārammaṇāḥ magga hetukāḥ na magga adhipatino

original: Siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, na vattabbā uppādinoti.
analyzed: siyā uppannā siyā anuppannā na vattabbā uppādino ti

original: Siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā.
analyzed: siyā atītā siyā anāgatā siyā paccuppannā
na vattabbā atīta ārammaṇā atipi anāgata ārammaṇā atipi paccuppanna ārammaṇā atipi

original: Siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā.
analyzed: siyā ajjhattā siyā bahiddhā siyā ajjhatta bahiddhā

original: Vīmaṁsiddhipādo hetu, tayo iddhipādā na hetū.
Vīmaṁsiddhipādo hetu ceva sahetuko ca, tayo iddhipādā na vattabbā “hetū ceva sahetukā cā”ti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū.
analyzed: hetu ca iva sa hetuko ca tayo iddhipādā na vattabbā hetū ca iva sa hetukā ca ati sa hetukā ca iva na ca hetū

original: Vīmaṁsiddhipādo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca, tayo iddhipādā na vattabbā “hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cā”ti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū.
analyzed: hetu ca iva hetu sampayutto ca tayo iddhipādāḥ na vattabbāḥ hetū ca iva hetu sampayuttā ca ati hetu sampayuttā ca iva na ca hetū

original: Tayo iddhipādā na hetū sahetukā, vīmaṁsiddhipādo na vattabbo “na hetu sahetuko”tipi, “na hetu ahetuko”tipi.
analyzed: tayo iddhipādāḥ na hetū sa hetukā vīma siddhipādaḥ na vattabbaḥ na hetu sa hetukaḥ itipi na hetu ahetukaḥ itipi

original: Na vattabbā āsavā ceva sāsavā cātipi, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavātipi.
analyzed: na vattabbā āsavā ca iva sa āsavā ca atipi sa āsavā ca iva no ca

original: Na vattabbā āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cātipi, āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavātipi.
analyzed: na vattabbā āsavā ca iva āsava sampayuttā ca atipi āsava sampayuttā ca iva no ca āsavā atipi

original: Tayo iddhipādā no cittā, cittiddhipādo cittaṁ.
Tayo iddhipādā cittasampayuttā, cittiddhipādo na vattabbo “cittena sampayutto”tipi, “cittena vippayutto”tipi.
analyzed: tayo iddhipādā citta sampayuttā citta iddhipādaḥ na vattabbo cittena sampayuttaḥ tipi cittena vippayuttaḥ tipi

original: Tayo iddhipādā cittasaṁsaṭṭhā, cittiddhipādo na vattabbo “cittena saṁsaṭṭho”tipi, “cittena visaṁsaṭṭho”tipi.
analyzed: tayo iddhipādā citta sasaṭṭhā citta iddhipādaḥ na vattabbo cittena sasaṭṭhaḥ itipi cittena visasaṭṭhaḥ itipi

original: Tayo iddhipādā cittasamuṭṭhānā, cittiddhipādo no cittasamuṭṭhāno.
analyzed: tayo iddhipādā citta samuṭṭhānā citta iddhipādaḥ no citta samuṭṭhānaḥ

original: Tayo iddhipādā cittasahabhuno, cittiddhipādo no cittasahabhū.
analyzed: tayo iddhipādā citta sahabhunaḥ cittiddhipādaḥ no citta sahabhū

original: Tayo iddhipādā cittānuparivattino, cittiddhipādo no cittānuparivatti.
analyzed: tayo iddhipādā citta anuparivattinaḥ cittiddhipādaḥ no citta anuparivatti

original: Tayo iddhipādā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā, cittiddhipādo no cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno.
analyzed: tayo iddhipādā citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānā citta iddhipādaḥ no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānaḥ

original: Tayo iddhipādā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno, cittiddhipādo no cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū.
analyzed: tayo iddhipādā citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhuno cittiddhipādaḥ no

original: Tayo iddhipādā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino, cittiddhipādo no cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti.
analyzed: tayo iddhipādā citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattino cittiddhipādo no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivatti
tayo iddhipādāḥ bāhirā citta iddhipādaḥ ajjhattikaḥ
siyā sa vitakkā siyā a vitakkā
siyā pīti sahagatā siyā na pīti sahagatā
siyā sukha sahagatā siyā na sukha sahagatā
siyā upekkhā sahagatā siyā na upekkhā sahagatā
